The logs show that there are gaps of more than 2 seconds. The test has a timeout of 2 seconds for the leader election to happen. Hence, I suggest to increase the timeout to 10s to be on the safe side.
Actually I suggest to replace busy loop waiting with using the LeaderRetrievalUtils.LeaderConnectionInfoListener which offers a CompletableFuture to wait on.
